net.jxta.ext.config
Interface IPAddressProfiler

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultIPAddressProfiler
public interface IPAddressProfiler

An interface which defines a standard way to evaluate a peers available IP addresses. Implementations should enumerate available IP addresses, check them for liveness (connection to a network), and whether they are NATed or Firewalled. Implementations should then determine which one is "best", using their own criteria. To use: First call profile(), which does all the profiling. If the profile() method detects that the peer has no IP address or if the "best" one is not connected to the wider Internet, then an exception is thrown. After profile() runs then call getBestIPAddress() to get the best IP address, followed by isBestNATedOrFirewalled() to determine if that address is NATed or firewalled.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Brad Neuberg, bkn3@columbia.edu

Method Summary
 java.net.InetAddress getBestIPAddress()
          Gets the "best" available IP address for this peer.
 boolean isBestNATedOrFirewalled()
          Determines if the best available IP address for this peer, as returned by getBestIPAddress(), is NATed or firewalled.
 void profile()
          Starts the actual profiling.
 

Method Detail

profile

public void profile()
             throws ConfiguratorException
Starts the actual profiling. Call this method first.

Throws:
ConfiguratorException - Thrown if an error occurs during profiling, or if this peer has no "best" IP address (i.e. it is not connected to the network or has no network interfaces configured).

getBestIPAddress

public java.net.InetAddress getBestIPAddress()
                                      throws ConfiguratorException
Gets the "best" available IP address for this peer.

Throws:
ConfiguratorException - Thrown if profile() hasn't been called yet.

isBestNATedOrFirewalled

public boolean isBestNATedOrFirewalled()
                                throws ConfiguratorException
Determines if the best available IP address for this peer, as returned by getBestIPAddress(), is NATed or firewalled.

Throws:
ConfiguratorException - Thrown if profile() hasn't been called yet.
